Title: La Truite (The Trout)
Writer: Roger Vailland (novel), Monique Lange (adaptation), Joseph Losey (adaptation), Monique Lange (dialogue)
Actors: Isabelle Huppert, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Jeanne Moreau, Daniel Olbrychski
Plot: Frederique (Huppert) leaves her family's small-town trout farm to embark on an journey taking her to Japan and into the arms of a man. Irritations concerning her actions and present state ...
